content: What's the name of the 19th-century British author known for his vivid characters and tales set in London, such as "Oliver Twist" and "A Christmas Carol"?

I believe the author you're referring to is Charles Dickens. He was indeed a prominent British novelist of the 19th century, famous for his intricate characterizations and storylines set in London. "Oliver Twist" and "A Christmas Carol" are two of his most well-known works.
